┌──────────┐
│ Get user │
└──────────┘

query GetUser {
	user(input: {id: "u1"}) {
		__typename
		... on User {
			id
			username
			articles {
				id
				createdAt
				title
				content
				comments {
					content
					author {
						username
					}
				}
			}
			comments {
				id
				content
			}
			likes {
				article {
					title
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

Failure: graphql: Cannot query field "article" on type "Article". Did you mean "title"?
